titleStmt.title: A proper ballad, intituled, The wandring Prince of Troy. To the tune of, Queene Dido.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. W[right]. in Gilt-spur street,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publisher's name suggested by Wing.
Verse: "When Troy town for ten years warres ..."
In two parts, printed side by side.
Imperfect: mutilated affecting text and ill.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
